Vanityfair.author: Lisa Abend
Vanityfair.title: How Kinfolk Magazine Defined the Millennial Aesthetic…and Unraveled Behind the Scenes
Vanityfair.description: The cult quarterly helped set the pace for the upwardly mobile, Instagram-perfect 2010s lifestyle. Off the page, its creators’ lives have been somewhat messier.
Vanityfair.content: Kinfolks origin story seems just as perfect, a charming myth crafted along the lines of one of those old Rooney-Garland, Hey gang, lets put on a show musicals. At the turn of the last decade, while still in college, two young married couples have the kooky id… [+4153 chars]

Thecut.title: Lee’s American Dream
Thecut.description: We said we followed the influencer for her wellness tips. But were our motivations really that pure?
Thecut.content: Lee Tilghman says her Instagram followers came to Lee From America for the drippy food content. They came for the buttery egg yolks, the clumps of gooey peanut butter, the tahini drizzled over veggies like a Jackson Pollock splatter painting. They came for ad… [+16738 chars]
